message:
YWCA Kalamazoo to build only human trafficking shelter in Michigan
The grant it received will allow them to expand their human trafficking program and will build a 17 bed shelter for survivors, offer legal support, therapy and case management.

data.description: A Kalamazoo non-profit is set to open Michigan’s only shelter for human trafficking survivors.The YWCA Kalamazoo said the grant it received will allow them to expand their human trafficking program…
data.title: YWCA Kalamazoo to build only human trafficking shelter in Michigan
